K10D0238_H0239:13a-18: de bzhin gshegs pa ni rgyags pa ma yin /
K10D0238_H0239:13a-20: rjes su chags pa ma yin /
K10D0238_H0239:13a-25: bsten par mdzad pa ma yin /
K10D0238_H0239:13a-26: nye ba'i nyon mongs pa ma yin mod kyi /
K10D0238_H0239:13a-29: dben pa la mngon par dga' ba rnams kyi bsngags pa'ang gsung ngo //
K10D0238_H0239:13a-30: me long lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas de
K10D0238_H0239:13a-31: bzhin gshegs pa ni shes bya thams cad la mi
K10D0238_H0239:13b-1: thugs su mchud pa gang yang med de /
K10D0238_H0239:13b-3: mi bya ba dag gzigs nas sems can de dang /
K10D0238_H0239:13b-4: de dag la de bzhin du 'jug go /
K10D0238_H0239:13b-5: de bzhin gshegs pa ni sems can gyi don phun sum tshogs pa la dgyes par mi 'gyur /
K10D0238_H0239:13b-6: ma 'byor pa la'ang mi dgyes par mi 'gyur te /
K10D0238_H0239:13b-7: yang dag par zhugs pa rnams la ni sgrib pa med pa'i byams pa chen po 'jug /
K10D0238_H0239:13b-8: log par zhugs pa rnams la ni sgrib pa med pa'i thugs rje chen po 'jug ste /
K10D0238_H0239:13b-10: byang chub sems dpas chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa
K10D0238_H0239:13b-11: bcu po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
K10D0238_H0239:13b-12: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
K10D0238_H0239:13b-13: kyi 'jug pa khong du chud par bya'o //
K10D0238_H0239:13b-15: byang chub sems dpas chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa
K10D0238_H0239:13b-16: bcus de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
K10D0238_H0239:13b-17: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi dpe dang 'dra
K10D0238_H0239:13b-18: ba khong du chud par bya ste /
K10D0238_H0239:13b-22: nyi ma ni sems can tha ma dang /
K10D0238_H0239:13b-26: ma dad pa thams cad la mtshungs par 'char zhing mtshungs par snang bar byed do //
K10D0238_H0239:13b-27: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
K10D0238_H0239:13b-28: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang sems can
K10D0238_H0239:14a-0: ma dad pa thams cad la mtshungs par 'char zhing mtshungs par ye shes snang bar mdzad @14a *//
K10D0238_H0239:14a-4: nam mkha' ni thams cad du sems can thams cad la mi sgrib pa'i ngo bo nyid de /
K10D0238_H0239:14a-5: gzhan du na glo bur gyi du ba dang /
K10D0238_H0239:14a-7: rdul dang; khug rna dag gis sgrib pa dang bcas par kun tu snang ngo //
K10D0238_H0239:14a-8: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa yang nam mkha'
K10D0238_H0239:14a-9: ltar sems can thams cad la mi sgrib pa'i ngo
K10D0238_H0239:14a-10: bo nyid de / gzhan du na glo bur gyi du ba dang /
K10D0238_H0239:14a-13: khug rna lta bu'i ngar 'dzin pa dang /
K10D0238_H0239:14a-14: nga yir 'dzin pas bsgribs par sems can rnams kyis
K10D0238_H0239:14a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing myong bar mi 'gyur
K10D0238_H0239:14a-18: me ni shing thams cad la yod mod kyi /
K10D0238_H0239:14a-20: rtsol ba ma tshang na mi 'bar zhing rang gi dgos pa rnams mi byed do //
K10D0238_H0239:14a-21: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang shes bya thams cad la gnas mod kyi /
K10D0238_H0239:14a-22: dad pa la sogs pa'i rkyen dang /
K10D0238_H0239:14a-23: rtsol ba ma tshang na mi 'byung ste /
K10D0238_H0239:14a-24: sangs rgyas kyi bya ba rnams kyang mi mdzad do //
K10D0238_H0239:14a-27: tshon tha dad pa snod gcig gi nang du blugs te /
K10D0238_H0239:14a-28: tshon mang po de'i nang du ras tha gu tha
K10D0238_H0239:14a-29: dad pas phur te bcug na phur ma'i dbang ji
K10D0238_H0239:14a-30: lta ba bzhin du tshon chags kyang tshon de dag
K10D0238_H0239:14a-31: mi rtog / rnam par mi rtog go /
K10D0238_H0239:14a-32: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i rtsa
K10D0238_H0239:14a-33: ba sna tshogs kyi tshogs mang po'ang mos pa'i tha
K10D0238_H0239:14b-0: gus ji ltar phur ba bzhin du sems can @14b
K10D0238_H0239:14b-1: rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ste /
K10D0238_H0239:14b-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan yang len par byed do //
K10D0238_H0239:14b-5: chus gang ba'i klung ni bstod kyang dma' bar 'bab po /
K10D0238_H0239:14b-6: zhe sdang zhing ngan du smras kyang dma' bar 'bab pa yin no //
K10D0238_H0239:14b-7: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang bstod dam /
K10D0238_H0239:14b-8: ngan du smras kyang ye shes kyis gshegs pa yin gyi /
K10D0238_H0239:14b-9: nga rgyal gyis gshegs pa ni ma yin no //
K10D0238_H0239:14b-14: gshags nas 'chos kyang mngar ba'i ro de mi 'dor ro //
K10D0238_H0239:14b-15: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang mchod kyang rung ma mchod kyang rung ste /
K10D0238_H0239:14b-16: bsnyen pa na rnam par grol ba'i mngar ba'i ro de mi 'dor ro //
K10D0238_H0239:14b-19: sa ni rnam par mi rtog cing 'gyur ba med
K10D0238_H0239:14b-20: par gnas te; de la khe 'dod pa gang dag
K10D0238_H0239:14b-21: gis rmos nas yongs su sbyang ba byas te sa
K10D0238_H0239:14b-22: bon btab pa de dag gi lo tog phun sum
K10D0238_H0239:14b-25: yongs su sbyang ba mi byed /
K10D0238_H0239:14b-26: sa bon mi 'debs pa de dag gi lo tog ni phun sum tshogs par mi 'gyur ro //
K10D0238_H0239:14b-27: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang sa ltar rnam
K10D0238_H0239:14b-28: par mi rtog cing 'gyur ba med par gnas te
K10D0238_H0239:14b-29: / de la yon tan 'dod pa gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa la dad pa dang /
K10D0238_H0239:14b-31: gus pa bskyed pa de dag gi yon tan gyi lo tog phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro //
K10D0238_H0239:15a-1: gshegs pa la dad pa dang /
K10D0238_H0239:15a-3: gus pa mi bskyed pa de dag gi yon tan
K10D0238_H0239:15a-4: gyi lo tog ni phun sum tshogs par mi 'gyur
K10D0238_H0239:15a-7: la la zhig gis tsandan dang /
K10D0238_H0239:15a-8: ga pur la mi snyan pa byas te ngan du brjod nas rang gi lus la bskus kyang /
K10D0238_H0239:15a-10: ga pur de dri zhim par byed kyi dri nga bar mi byed do //
K10D0238_H0239:15a-11: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
K10D0238_H0239:15a-12: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyang ngan du
K10D0238_H0239:15a-13: smra ste mi snyan pa brjod nas bsnyen cing bsten
K10D0238_H0239:15a-14: te bsnyen bkur byed pa de dag de bzhin gshegs
K10D0238_H0239:15a-15: pas sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi dri dang ldan
K10D0238_H0239:15a-20: khri lam ni sems can tha ma dang /
K10D0238_H0239:15a-22: mchog thams cad la mi thogs pa dang /
K10D0238_H0239:15a-23: bde bar 'gro bar byed pas mtshungs par gnas so //
K10D0238_H0239:15a-24: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang sems can tha ma dang /
K10D0238_H0239:15a-26: mchog thams cad la mi mnyam pa med cing sgrib pa med pa dang /
K10D0238_H0239:15a-27: bde bar 'gro bas mtshungs par 'jug go /
K10D0238_H0239:15a-30: ri'i rgyal po gangs ri la rtsi'i rgyal po mthong na mdzes pa zhes bya ba yod de /
K10D0238_H0239:15a-31: de mthong ma thag tu sems can thams cad kyi nad thams cad med par 'gyur ro //
K10D0238_H0239:15b-0: de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa'ang @15b mthong ma
K10D0238_H0239:15b-1: thag tu sems can thams cad kyi nad thams cad
K10D0238_H0239:15b-4: byang chub sems dpas chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa
K10D0238_H0239:15b-5: bcu po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
K10D0238_H0239:15b-6: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
K10D0238_H0239:15b-7: kyi dpe dang 'dra ba khong du chud par bya'o
K10D0238_H0239:15b-9: byang chub sems dpas chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa bcus sangs rgyas khong du chud par bya ste /
K10D0238_H0239:15b-12: rgyu mthun pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
K10D0238_H0239:15b-13: rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang /
K10D0238_H0239:15b-14: ting nge 'dzin gyi sangs rgyas dang /
K10D0238_H0239:15b-15: smon lam gyi sangs rgyas dang /
K10D0238_H0239:15b-17: ngo bo nyid kyi sangs rgyas dang /
K10D0238_H0239:15b-18: longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
K10D0238_H0239:15b-21: mdun du gzhag pa'i sangs rgyas so //
K10D0238_H0239:15b-22: de la rgyu mthun pa'i sangs rgyas gang zhe na /
K10D0238_H0239:15b-23: gang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rgyu mthun pa dang /
K10D0238_H0239:15b-24: pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos sgrub par byed pa yin te /
K10D0238_H0239:15b-25: 'di gnyis las gang grub pa de ni sgrub pa'i sangs rgyas te /
K10D0238_H0239:15b-26: de'i phyir rgyu mthun pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya'o //
K10D0238_H0239:15b-27: de la rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i sangs rgyas gang zhe na /
K10D0238_H0239:15b-28: rgyu mthun pa gang pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi rnam par smin pa yin te /
K10D0238_H0239:15b-29: rnam par smin pa de las gang rnam par smin pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su 'byung ngo //
K10D0238_H0239:16a-1: sems can gyi byin gyi rlabs dang /
K10D0238_H0239:16a-2: chos kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi phyir 'byung ste /
K10D0238_H0239:16a-3: 'di ni rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i sangs rgyas zhes bya'o //
K10D0238_H0239:16a-4: de la ting nge 'dzin gyi sangs rgyas gang zhe na /
K10D0238_H0239:16a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang la snyoms
K10D0238_H0239:16a-6: par 'jug cing ting nge 'dzin gang la snyoms par
K10D0238_H0239:16a-7: zhugs nas lhun gyis grub cing rtsol ba mi mnga'
K10D0238_H0239:16a-8: bar sangs rgyas brgya stong 'byung ste /
K10D0238_H0239:16a-9: ting nge 'dzin gyi byin gyi rlabs des ting nge
K10D0238_H0239:16a-10: 'dzin las byung bas na ting nge 'dzin gyi sangs
K10D0238_H0239:16a-12: 'di ni ting nge 'dzin gyi sangs rgyas zhes bya'o //
K10D0238_H0239:16a-13: de la smon lam gyi sangs rgyas gang zhe na /
K10D0238_H0239:16a-14: byang chub sems dpas gang sems can gang dang /
K10D0238_H0239:16a-17: spyod lam ji lta ji lta bu gang dang gang gis 'dul bar 'gyur ba de dang /
K10D0238_H0239:16a-18: de la de lta bu'i gzugs dang /
K10D0238_H0239:16a-20: spyod lam gyis 'dul bar gyur cig ces smon lam btab nas /
K10D0238_H0239:16a-21: de sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis 'dul te /
K10D0238_H0239:16a-22: smon lam de las byung bas smon lam gyi sangs rgyas zhes bya ste /
K10D0238_H0239:16a-23: 'di ni smon lam gyi sangs rgyas zhes bya'o; ;de la sems kyi sangs rgyas gang zhe na /
K10D0238_H0239:16a-24: gang byang chub sems dpas sems la dbang rab tu thob nas /
K10D0238_H0239:16a-25: de sems la dbang ba des gang dang /
K10D0238_H0239:16b-1: de sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can rnams mthong
K10D0238_H0239:16b-2: nas bdag sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su gyur cig ces
K10D0238_H0239:16b-4: de sems las byung bas na sems kyi sangs rgyas yin te /
K10D0238_H0239:16b-5: 'dul ba de dag kyang rang gi sems yongs su dag pas sangs rgyas mthong zhing shes te /
K10D0238_H0239:16b-6: 'di ni sems kyi sangs rgyas zhes bya'o //
K10D0238_H0239:16b-7: de la ngo bo nyid kyi sangs rgyas gang zhe na /
K10D0238_H0239:16b-8: ngo bo nyid kyi sangs rgyas ni gnas ngan len gyi gnas gyur pa /
K10D0238_H0239:16b-12: chos kyi dbyings rnam pa tha dad pa /
K10D0238_H0239:16b-16: skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang
K10D0238_H0239:16b-17: ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su snang ba 'di
K10D0238_H0239:16b-18: ni ngo bo nyid kyi sangs rgyas zhes bya'o //
K10D0238_H0239:16b-19: de la longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang zhe na /
K10D0238_H0239:16b-20: gang byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
K10D0238_H0239:16b-22: kun tu spyod pa mtshungs pa dang /
K10D0238_H0239:16b-27: spyod pa mtshungs pa 'di ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya'o //
K10D0238_H0239:16b-28: de la sprul pa'i sangs rgyas gang zhe na /
K10D0238_H0239:16b-30: byang chub sems dpas gzugs thams cad ston pa'i ting
K10D0238_H0239:16b-31: nge 'dzin thob pa de dag ting nge 'dzin de
K10D0238_H0239:17a-0: dbang thob cing snying rje chen pos bskul bas sangs rgyas kyi gzugs su sprul nas sems @17a *//
K10D0238_H0239:17a-1: can rnams 'dul ba 'di ni sprul pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya'o //
K10D0238_H0239:17a-2: de la btags pa'i sangs rgyas gang zhe na /
K10D0238_H0239:17a-3: 'di la la zhig slob dpon nam mkhan po la sangs rgyas bzhin du blta /
K10D0238_H0239:17a-4: sangs rgyas bzhin du bsnyen bkur byed de /
K10D0238_H0239:17a-6: mkhan po de la sangs rgyas bzhin du blta zhing
K10D0238_H0239:17a-7: sangs rgyas bzhin du bsnyen bkur byas pas; de sangs
K10D0238_H0239:17a-8: rgyas kyi chos rnams rab tu 'dzin la yongs su
K10D0238_H0239:17a-10: yongs su bsgrub pa 'di ni btags pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya'o //
K10D0238_H0239:17a-11: de la mdun du gzhag pa'i sangs rgyas gang zhe na /
K10D0238_H0239:17a-12: 'di la la la zhig gis sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs byas sam /
K10D0238_H0239:17a-14: mchod cing rim gro bya ba thams cad kyis bsti stang du byed /
K10D0238_H0239:17a-15: bla mar byed; ri mor byed cing /
K10D0238_H0239:17a-16: de sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams rab tu 'dzin la yongs su rdzogs par byed de /
K10D0238_H0239:17a-17: yongs su bsgrub pa 'di ni mdun du gzhag pa'i sangs rgyas zhes bya ste /
K10D0238_H0239:17a-19: byang chub sems dpas chos kyi tshul la 'jug pa
K10D0238_H0239:17a-20: bcu po de dag gis sangs rgyas khong du chud
K10D0238_H0239:17a-22: byang chub sems dpas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
K10D0238_H0239:17a-23: pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi
K10D0238_H0239:17a-24: tha snyad du ston pa rnam pa bcur khong du
K10D0238_H0239:17a-26: rnam pa bcu gang zhe na /
K10D0238_H0239:17b-8: shi ba'i nyir mtshams sbyor ba ston pa dang /
K10D0238_H0239:17b-9: de rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa ston pa'o //
K10D0238_H0239:17b-10: de la ji ltar na phung po ston pa tha snyad du ston ce na /
K10D0238_H0239:17b-11: gzugs kyi phung po ni don dam par yod pa ma yin no //
K10D0238_H0239:17b-12: gal te gzugs kyi phung po don dam par yod
K10D0238_H0239:17b-13: du zin na ni de yongs su btang bas srid
K10D0238_H0239:17b-15: gang yongs su btang nas grol ba de la gnas pa'am /
K10D0238_H0239:17b-16: 'gro ba yod par 'gyur ba zhig na /
K10D0238_H0239:17b-17: de lta ma yin pas de'i phyir gzugs kyi phung po ston pa tha snyad du ston pa'o //
K10D0238_H0239:17b-18: de bzhin du tshor ba'i phung po ston pa dang /
K10D0238_H0239:17b-19: 'du shes kyi phung po ston pa dang /
K10D0238_H0239:17b-20: 'du byed kyi phung po ston pa dang /
K10D0238_H0239:17b-21: rnam par shes pa'i phung po ston pa tha snyad du ston pa yin te /
K10D0238_H0239:17b-22: rnam par shes pa'i phung po ni don dam par yod pa ma yin no //
K10D0238_H0239:17b-23: gal te rnam par shes pa'i phung po don dam
K10D0238_H0239:17b-24: par yod du zin na ni de yongs su btang
K10D0238_H0239:17b-26: gang yongs su btang nas grol ba de la gnas pa'am /
K10D0238_H0239:17b-27: 'gro ba yod par 'gyur ba zhig na; de lta
K10D0238_H0239:17b-28: ma yin pas de'i phyir rnam par shes pa'i phung
K10D0238_H0239:17b-29: po ston pa tha snyad du ston pa'o //
K10D0238_H0239:17b-30: de bzhin du khams ston pa dang /
K10D0238_H0239:17b-31: skye mched ston pa ni tha snyad du ston pa'o //
K10D0238_H0239:18a-1: sems can du ston pa tha snyad du ston pa yin zhe na /
K10D0238_H0239:18a-2: sems can ni don dam par yod pa ma yin te /
K10D0238_H0239:18a-3: de ni chos tsam du zad pas sems can med do //
K10D0238_H0239:18a-4: gal te sems can yod du zin na ni phung
K10D0238_H0239:18a-5: po 'gags pas na nam mkha' bzhin du sems can
K10D0238_H0239:18a-7: phung po bzhin du sems can yang 'dus ma byas su 'gyur ba zhig na /
K10D0238_H0239:18a-8: de lta ma yin pas de'i phyir sems can ston pa tha snyad du ston pa'o //
K10D0238_H0239:18a-9: de la ji ltar na las ston pa tha snyad du ston pa yin zhe na /
K10D0238_H0239:18a-10: las rnams byed pa yod pa'ang ma yin /
K10D0238_H0239:18a-12: gal te las rnams byed pa zhig yod du zin
K10D0238_H0239:18a-13: na ni las rnams byed pa nam mkha' bzhin du
K10D0238_H0239:18a-15: phung po bzhin du 'dus byas su'ang 'gyur ba zhig na /
K10D0238_H0239:18a-16: ma byas pa ni nam mkha' dang mtshungs te /
K10D0238_H0239:18a-17: ma byas pa rnams byed par mi 'gyur ro //
K10D0238_H0239:18a-18: de'i phyir las gang la'ang byed pa med do //
K10D0238_H0239:18a-19: de med pas na las yod par ga la 'gyur te /
K10D0238_H0239:18a-20: de'i phyir las ston pa tha snyad du ston pa'o //
K10D0238_H0239:18a-21: de la ji ltar na skye ba ston pa tha snyad du ston pa yin zhe na /
K10D0238_H0239:18a-22: skye ba ni don dam par yod pa ma yin no //
K10D0238_H0239:18a-23: gal te skye ba don dam par yod du zin na ni rtag par 'gyur te /
K10D0238_H0239:18a-24: de ltar na skye ba ni skye ba med par 'gyur ro //
K10D0238_H0239:18a-25: gang skyes pas skye ba dang /
K10D0238_H0239:18a-26: skye bas gzir bar 'gyur ba de'ang med par 'gyur te /
K10D0238_H0239:18b-0: de'i phyir skye ba ston pa tha snyad @18b du ston pa'o //
K10D0238_H0239:18b-1: de la ji ltar na rga ba ston pa tha snyad du ston pa yin zhe na /

K10D0238_H0239:33b-26: nyan thos kyi gzugs su sprul nas sdug bsngal zad

K10D0238_H0239:34a-4: sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba ma yin pa de na

K10D0238_H0239:34b-0: sangs rgyas kyi rdzu @34b 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen

K10D0238_H0239:34b-26: byed do // nam sems can rnams byang chub kyi

K10D0238_H0239:35a-1: 'khor rgya chen pos 'dul bar gyur pa de na lha dang /

K10D0238_H0239:35a-28: chu zla ni yod pa ma yin no //
K10D0238_H0239:35a-29: de bzhin du dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa'i

K10D0238_H0239:35a-32: ji ltar nam mkha'i zla ba chu'i nang du mi
K10D0238_H0239:35a-33: 'pho ba de bzhin du dge ba'i las kyi srid
K10D0238_H0239:35a-34: pa 'du byed rnams kyang srid pa 'du byed rnams
K10D0238_H0239:35b-0: @35b las kyi srid pa'i rkyen las kyang srid pa'i
K10D0238_H0239:35b-1: rnam par smin pa'i dbang ba nyid kyang 'byung ngo
K10D0238_H0239:35b-4: rma bya'i mdongs gcig las srog chags rnams la gzugs du mar snang ngo /

K10D0238_H0239:35b-6: ba mngon par 'du bya ba gcig las rnam par

K10D0238_H0239:35b-12: srid pa'i rnam par smin pa'i dbang ba nyid kyang

K10D0238_H0239:35b-27: / dge ba'i las kyi srid pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa'i dbang ba nyid kyang 'byung ngo //

K10D0238_H0239:36a-9: kyi srid pa'i 'du byed rnams yang srid pa'i 'du
K10D0238_H0239:36a-10: byed rnams su 'pho ba ma yin te /
K10D0238_H0239:36a-11: rab tu chos spyod pa'i rkyen gyis rab tu'ang srid
K10D0238_H0239:36a-12: pa'i rnam par smin pa'i dbang ba nyid kyang 'byung

K10D0238_H0239:36a-16: 'byung yang der 'byung ba chen po rnams 'pho ba'ang
K10D0238_H0239:36a-17: ma yin la; 'byung ba chen po'i rkyen gyis 'ja'i

K10D0238_H0239:36b-23: ba'i 'du byed kyi las kyi rnam par smin pa

K10D0238_H0239:37a-1: 'du byed pa'i rkyen gyis rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyi sgrib pa med pa'ang 'byung ste /
K10D0238_H0239:37a-2: ri la sogs pa 'pho ba'ang ma yin /
K10D0238_H0239:37a-3: bsams pa tsam gyis sgrib pa med par 'byung ba'ang ma yin no //

K10D0238_H0239:37a-6: rnam par smin pa'i dbang ba nyid 'byung ngo //
K10D0238_H0239:37a-9: rlung gi rkyen gyis me 'byung gi /

K10D0238_H0239:37a-12: sogs par rnam par smin pa'i dbang ba nyid 'byung

K10D0238_H0239:37b-0: bsams pa tsam gyis @37b sgrib pa med par 'gyur ba yang ma yin /
K10D0238_H0239:37b-1: sems kyi sgrib pa med pa de dang mi ldan
K10D0238_H0239:37b-2: par sra ba la sogs pa'i sgrib pa med par

K10D0238_H0239:37b-18: rnam par thar pa brgyad dang /
K10D0238_H0239:37b-19: zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad dang /

K10D0238_H0239:37b-30: sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i shes pa dang /
K10D0238_H0239:37b-31: rdzu 'phrul bya ba shes pa dang /
K10D0238_H0239:37b-32: zag pa zad pa shes pa ste /

K10D0238_H0239:38a-32: byis pa so so'i skye bo dang /
K10D0238_H0239:38b-0: @38b lto 'phye chen po thams cad dang /

K10D0238_H0239:38b-23: la khong khro bar yang mi byed /

K10D0238_H0239:39a-1: rol gyi sems shes pa ni rang gi sems yongs su shes pa dang ldan pa yin te /
K10D0238_H0239:39a-2: de rang gi sems yongs su shes pa dang ldan
K10D0238_H0239:39a-3: pas sems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa
